resources.string: とは (Towa) is an offline bilingual (JP -> ENG) and monolingual (JP -> JP) japanese pop-up dictionary with Anki integration.
Towa uses free, publicly available data sources to comprise its dictionary.

Sourced from JMdict (JMdict_e_examp.gz, which include examples from the Tanaka Corpus).
\n\nThis is property of the Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group, and used in accordence with their Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike Licence (V4.0).
Sourced from JmdictFurigana, using the same license as JMdict above (Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike Licence (V4.0)).

Half-sourced from Tofugu\'s vocab & learning site WaniKani, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike Licence (V4.0).
\n\nHalf-sourced from the Kanji Alive project, licensed under the Create Commons CC BY 4.0.
Sourced from Jonathan Waller\'s resources, and licensed under Create Commons CC BY 4.0.
